column4: Greetings again gentlemen, Is there an equivalent to rythmbox-client for and video players like vlc?
I suppose are they just called clients?
Many. Banshee, audacious, parole are all examples of music players. For video players: VLC, Movie player, Parole, mplayer, and tons more.
Ah. There are music players that do so, not sure about video players
